settings.text: §l Default:§r§a Hide player helmets only.§r Hides helmets that only players are wearing, not any other entities.
§a Hide helmets from all entities.§r Hides helmest that any entities are wearing, including players and mobs.
§a Hide mob helmets only.§r Hides helmets that, other than players, any entity is wearing.
